name: Invertical SavePoint
description:
On Saturday 12th October through to Sunday 13th I will be taking part in the 10th SavePoint, a 24 hour gaming marathon, along with my wonderful wife. We are raising money for the Edinburgh Children’s Hospital Charity.

But that is probably not why you’re looking at this page. I have a free game for you to play, using Invertical’s gameplay and a SavePoint theme. Can you go collect donations and deliver them to doctors to help take care of sick kids. You can play in a browser  or download it.

Please donate on my everydayhero page!
